# ML 프로젝트 구조

ML을 포함한 데이터 과학 프로젝트는 다음과 같은 구조를 가지고 있다.


:::{.panel-tabset}

## ML 프로젝트 일반

```bash
project_name/
    data/
        raw/
        processed/
        external/
    notebooks/
        exploratory/
        models/
    src/
        data_processing/
        model_training/
        visualization/
    models/
        saved/
    reports/
        figures/
        presentations/
        papers/
    README.md
    requirements.txt
    setup.py
```


## 펭귄 ML 프로젝트 (파이썬)

```bash
penguins_classification/
    data/
        raw/
            penguins_raw.csv
        processed/
            penguins_processed.csv
    notebooks/
        exploratory/
            penguins_eda.ipynb
        models/
            penguins_model_development.ipynb
    src/
        data_processing/
            penguins_processing.py
        model_training/
            penguins_training.py
        visualization/
            penguins_visualization.py
    models/
        saved/
            penguins_model.pkl
    reports/
        figures/
            penguins_confusion_matrix.png
            penguins_feature_importance.png
        presentations/
            penguins_presentation.pptx
    README.md
    requirements.txt
    setup.py
```
